label: SubordinateLocation
comment: A physical location or place which is a subordinate location of a location.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying the type of this logistics related location.

objectProperties.comment: A set of geographical coordinates of a specific point such as the longitude, latitude and altitude.
The location subordinate to this subordinate location.

referencedBy.comment: A physical location or place which is a subordinate location of a location.
